Title.evidence: Retrospective Observational Cohort Study on Fluid Responsiveness in Pediatric Intensive Care

Participants.evidence: patients ≤18 years old within the first 72 hours of admission to a PICU

Intervention.evidence: analyzed IV crystalloid fluid boluses ≥10 mL/kg

Objective.evidence: This study assesses the association between Ea dyn and mean arterial pressure (MAP) after fluid bolus in children

Method_Outcome.evidence: FR was defined as an increase of ≥10% in MAP from pre-bolus to the average MAP over 20 minutes post-bolus

Number_Analysed.evidence: We analyzed 490 fluid boluses given to children

Result_Outcome.evidence: Pre-bolus Ea dyn was not associated with FR (p > 0.1)
